alert.note: Alert for Northeast Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 20 at 2:02PM PST until December 21 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and areas of blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Cloverland Road, Peola, Mountain Road, and Anatone. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
